page.title: 08EMMA IN BYFIELD ,AFTER NOON.
page.content: AFTER LUNCH WE HAD ANOTHER PLAYTIME. AFTER PLAY I PAINTED MY CLAY MODEL.IT WAS OF ONE OF THE REDS.YOU SEE WE SAW A PLAY ABOUT THE REDS AND THE BLUES AND HOW THEY HAD A WALL BUILT BETWEEN THE , TWO COUNTRIES.THEN WE WERE SENT OUT TO PLAY.AFTER PLAY WE DID ATHLETICS.WE DID SKIPPING -I MIGHT BE PICKED FOR THE TRIANGULAR SPORTS.THEN WE WENT HOME.I GOT READY FOR BROWNIES.I GOT FULL POINTS FOR POCKET INSPECTION.I WENT HOME AND WATCHED "FAME" AND "ALLO,ALLO" ON TELEVISION AND THEN WENT TO BED.
